title: I deposited money into a game on GLife but now I can t open it What should I do
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

## Articles in this section

- [My GLife voucher is not working. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/41422642490905-My-GLife-voucher-is-not-working-What-do-I-do)

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

If you’ve deposited money into a game through GLife but are now can’t access the game via GLife, follow these steps:

1. **Check if the game has downtime** Check the game’s official website or social media pages for announcements about ongoing maintenance or downtime.
2. **Validate if your deposit was processed** Open your GCash transaction history to ensure the deposit to the game was successfully processed.

3. **Troubleshoot GCash app** If you continue to experience errors,  [troubleshoot your GCash app](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/38910877046937-How-to-troubleshoot-GCash-app-issues) **.**

If the deposit was not reflected to the game within **24 hours**. Please contact the merchant directly.

### **Need more Help?**

For other inquiries or concerns, check out the following articles:
